entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Rapids

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
